meanings.sent1: The raftered roof provided sturdy support for the house.
meanings.sent2: The old barn had a raftered structure that withstood many storms.
meanings.sent3: The raftered ceiling made the attic a cozy hideaway.
meanings.sent4: The raftered beams crisscrossed like a giant spiderweb above our heads.
meanings.sent5: The raftered framework of the gazebo created a charming ambiance.

meanings.sent1: The raftered porch shielded us from the scorching sun.
meanings.sent2: The raftered walls of the cabin echoed with the sound of rain.
meanings.sent3: The raftered patio became the perfect spot for a summer barbecue.
meanings.sent4: The raftered veranda resembled a leafy canopy overhead.
meanings.sent5: The raftered roof over the deck provided a cool retreat on hot days.

meanings.sent1: The raftered attic stored many forgotten treasures.
meanings.sent2: The raftered eaves of the house dripped with rainwater.
meanings.sent3: The raftered shed became a makeshift clubhouse for the kids.
meanings.sent4: The raftered structure of the gazebo framed the garden beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The raftered rafters creaked softly in the gentle breeze.
